1.0.name: wordpress/runkeeper-fitness-feed
1.0.description:
The Runkeeper WordPress Widget allows you to display up to the last 20 Runkeeper activities with the widget area in your WordPress blog. It displays:

  • Activity type
  • Distance (km)
  • Duration (h:m:s)

You can customise the following:

  • Feed title
  • Feed length (1, 5, 10, 15, 20)
  • Display size (small, medium, large)
